The email from Texas Democratic Party Ch: mentioning their alleged fundraiser featuring author Matthew Vadum.
The online invitation to the event: provided by party spokeswoman Rebecca Acuña, which listed Matthew Vadum as the featured speaker discussing his book.
Confirmation from Catherine Engelbrecht: president of the King Street Patriots, that the luncheon did take place.
Background information on the King Stree: as well as their legal dispute with the state Democratic Party.
